short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension copies the active tab URL and paste it into the NAF creation page in Salesforce.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the Google Extension, "LCA URL Copy-Paste," a handy tool designed to streamline your workflow in Salesforce. This extension allows you to effortlessly copy the URL of your active tab and paste it directly into the Visualforce page called LCA Generator in Salesforce.

With "LCA URL Copy-Paste," you can bid farewell to manual copying and pasting of URLs between different platforms. Install the extension, and it seamlessly integrates with your Google Chrome browser. Whenever you're on a page with the desired URL, a single click will copy it to your clipboard.

When you navigate to the LCA Generator Visualforce page in Salesforce, the extension takes over. By clicking the extension icon or using a keyboard shortcut, it intelligently pastes the copied URL into the designated field on the page, eliminating the need for manual input.

Save valuable time and reduce the risk of errors by utilizing the "LCA URL Copy-Paste" extension. Whether you're a Salesforce administrator, developer, or user, this extension will enhance your productivity and streamline your LCA generation process. Say goodbye to tedious manual tasks and focus on what truly mattersâ€”getting the job done efficiently.
